page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: IN STURMINSTER MARSHALL WE HAVE A FIRST SCHOOL.I AM STILL GOING TO IT BUT IN ABOUT A WEEK I WILL BE GOING TO LOCKYERS MIDDLE AT CORFE MULLEN. THERE IS A PRIVATE SCHOOL AT SHAPWICK. A FRIEND I USED TO KNOW WENT TO IT.OUR SCHOOL IS FIVE TO NINE YEARS OF AGE BUT SOME OF THE CHILDREN WHO START AT OUR SCHOOL ARE FOUR AND A HALF YEARS OF AGE.AT OUR SCHOOL WE HAVE A PLAYGROUP AND TODDLER THEY ARE FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE TOO YOUNG TO GO SCHOOL.AT LOCKYERS IT IS FROM NINE TO THIRTEEN,THEIR SCHOOL IS MUCH BIGGER THAN OUR SCHOOL.WHEN YOU ARE THIRTEEN YOU GO TO CORFE HILLS SCHOOL. IT IS FROM THIRTEEN TO SIXTEEN BUT YOU CAN STAY ON UNTIL EIGHTEEN.
